aboutme.text1: Hi, I’m Felicia – a Frontend Developer with a background in medical technology and usability. After completing my Bachelor’s degree in Biomedical Engineering and my Master’s degree in Hearing Technology and Audiology, I worked for several years in the medical device industry as a System and Development Engineer, Technical Audiologist, and Usability Engineer. During this time, I learned how crucial well-thought-out user experience is.
aboutme.text2: My passion for usability eventually led me to frontend development, where I combine my technical expertise with creating user-friendly applications. Through my training at Developer Akademie, I am now able to build modern, user-centered frontend solutions – with a focus on clean code, intuitive UI, and sustainable user experience.
aboutme.text3: I'd love to turn ideas into user-friendly experiences - let's make it happen!
aboutme.workremote: Open to work remote and hybrid

skills.intro: These are skills I've been gained during my training at Developer Akademie:
skills.interest: Also, I'm interested in diving into:

portfolio.desc: From ten projects, I chose the ones that best demonstrate my skills. Each project is complete and ready for testing. My focus was on clean coding and barrier-free standards and fine details in implementation. Please feel free to take a look. Your feedback would be greatly appreciated.

join.desc: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

elpolloloco.desc: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
